TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit OdbcErrorCollection extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable

Docs.summary: Collects all errors generated by the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcDataAdapter">. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This class is created by <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcException> to collect instances of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> class. OdbcErrorCollection always contains at least one instance of the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> class.
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> within the OdbcErrorCollection.
[!CODE [Classic WebData OdbcError.Message#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcError.Message#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (Array array, int i);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void CopyTo(class System.Array array, int32 i) cil managed

Docs.param: The array into which to copy the elements.
Docs.summary: Copies the elements of the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"> into an array, starting at the specified index within the array.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> within the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> collection.
[!CODE [Classic WebData OdbcError.Message#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcError.Message#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError[] array, int i);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError[] array, int32 i) cil managed

Docs.param: The <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"> that is the destination of the elements copied from the current <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection">.
A 32-bit integer that represents the index in the <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"> at which copying starts.
Docs.summary: Copies all the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection"> starting at the specified destination index.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> within the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> collection.
[!CODE [Classic WebData OdbcError.Message#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcError.Message#1)]

Docs.summary: Gets the number of errors in the collection.
Docs.value: The total number of errors in the collection.

remarks.format:
## Examples The following example displays each <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError> within the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection>.
[!CODE [Classic WebData OdbcError.Message#1](../CodeSnippet/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData OdbcError.Message#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance class System.Collections.IEnumerator GetEnumerator() cil managed

Docs.summary: Returns an object that implements the <see cref="N:">[System.Collections.IEnumerator](assetId:///System.Collections.IEnumerator?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True) interface and that can iterate through the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> objects in the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection>.
Docs.returns: An object that implements the <see cref="N:">assetId:///System.Collections.IEnumerator?qualifyHint=False&autoUpgrade=True interface and that can iterate through the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> objects in the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection>.

Docs.param: The zero-based index of the error to retrieve.
Docs.summary: Gets the error at the specified index.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcError"> that contains the error at the specified index.

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A>.
Docs.value: `true` if access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection"> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, `false`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

Docs.summary: For a description of this member, see <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A>.
Docs.value: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <see cref="T:System.Collections.ICollection">.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This member is an explicit interface member implementation. It can be used only when the <xref:System.Data.Odbc.OdbcErrorCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
